Remote Raise

October 2020

Review Remote Raise from Thursday 22nd October. Watch a great lunchtime of startups pitching for investments.

Cindy Van Niekerk

Umazi have developed an innovative blockchain solution for the management of corporate identity information across industries such as finance, legal and real estate.

Watch Cindy Pitch http://www.umazi.io

Emmet Creighton

Lintil surrounds the house-buyer with all the services that they need when buying a house

Watch Emmet Pitch https://www.lintil.com

George Armstrong

Scanmatix are a Northern Irish startup helping retailers carryout fast and accurate stocktaking. Stock Control at Your Fingertips.

Watch George Pitch https://scanmatix.com

Dave Kearney

Champion's Mind is Headspace for athletes. They are an app for athletes, focused on the US Market.

Watch Dave Pitch https://www.championsmind.app

Dave McGreevy

RecFunnel accelerates the recruitment pipeline and ensures recruiters have a regular deal flow of roles

Watch Dave Pitch http://recfunnel.com

Ciaran Brennan

Livecosts allows construction costs to be forecast more accurately and enables more real-time monitoring of project costs.

Watch Ciaran Pitch https://livecosts.com

Sam Lynas

Haru powers charities online by revolutising how they operate. Haru is a mobile app that makes shop management and online selling easier for charity shops.

Watch Sam Pitch https://www.haru.ie

Calling Angel Investors and Funds to view exciting early stage tech companies pitching for seed investment.
